Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

  • Class
    Description
    Card
    Represents a single card in a card game.
    Client
    The Client class represents a client that connects to the NonBlockingServer to participate in games.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of cards used in the game.
    Game
    Represents a generic game class.
    GameDictionary
    The GameDictionary class is a utility class that dynamically discovers and creates instances of all subclasses of the Game class in the specified package.
    GameForTestOnly
    The GameForTestOnly class is a subclass of the Game class, created specifically for testing purposes.
    HandRanker
    This class is responsible for determining the rank of a hand of cards in poker.
    IntAndString
    The IntAndString record is a simple data structure that holds an integer value and a string.
    Main1
     
    NonBlockingServer
    The NonBlockingServer class represents a non-blocking server that uses Java NIO to manage multiple client connections concurrently.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player in the poker game.
    Poker
    Represents the Poker game implementation, extending the base Game class.
    Rank
    The Rank enum represents the possible ranks (values) of playing cards.
    Suit
    The Suit enum represents the four possible suits of a standard deck of cards.
    SuitEmojis
    The SuitEmojis enum represents the emoji symbols for the four suits in a deck of cards.
